page.title: Grey Seen as Leading Paramount Candidate
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Brad Grey, executive producer of the hit television show "The Sopranos" and chairman of a top Hollywood talent management firm, has emerged as the leading candidate to succeed Sherry Lansing as head of Viacom Inc.'s <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=VIAb.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">VIAb.N</A> Paramount Pictures, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.
